title: "Unspecified Error occured" on 6.22 patch
body:
So I had attempted to update to the 6.22 patch which came out not long ago, it was successful however, i had a blackout right when i got to the login screen, as i restarted my computer and opened the league of legends client, I received the "Unspecified Error Occured"  (http://imgur.com/a/fXHwj). I had attempted to fix it through restarting the lol client, restarting PC and deleting the Lol_Air_Client Folder which all turned out unsuccessful. I have skimmed through the forums for a solution but found nothing.

Any assistances? Ty

replies.body: yeah me too... im playing league last nov.19 then i started to take a bath,turned off my pc coz its running for long hours.. then after i finish evrything.. i open my pc started to play lol.. but when i open i got unspecified error.. its stuck with calculating differences.. then aftr that this annoying unspecified error.. tried all the guides and trouble shooting even the hextech.. tried it ALL trust me! and then i gave up! i ddnt play league.. for 6 straight days! but evry single day i tried to launch the clien i still got the same problem.. tried to reinstall too.. MANY TIMES! (5 i think) and the yesterday (nov.26).. suddenly it runs! im so happy coz i ddnt do anything and it fixed itself! aftr so many games i call it a day.. and then the next day IT HAPPENS AGAIN! THIS UNSPECIFIED ERROR SHIIT! UNTIL NOW..  i got this same problem.. please fix this.... i dunno whats the problem anymore...

Since this is happening at 33%, where your patcher attempts to start pulling files from the patching servers, this is likely caused by an unstable connection to those servers. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a great place to start in troubleshooting this, so I'd recommend giving those steps a go.

Let me know if this helped.

Every single riot worker that has attempted to give us advice on how to fix this fucking problem just comes into the forum and tells us to use the "connection guide". Every patch you get issues with files and unspecified errors and you don't do anything but tell us to fix our connection like some kind of spam bot.{{item:3151}}

Yup,  I am having the error too. I deleted the game twice and reinstalled. Its frustrating ... knowing how much time I have wasted. 


Hopefully we find a way.  :(
same here i have bin trying to fix it for 8 fcking hours now... i am getting tired of this why cant riot just fix this for us ?
No clue ... I have the same problem.. {{champion:122}}
